thread.title_full: World Day against the Death Penalty (Foreign Office of the Federal Republic of Germany) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: World Day against the Death Penalty (Foreign Office of the Federal Republic of Germany)
text: ( Source : Foreign Office of the Federal Republic of Germany ) To mark the World Day against the Death Penalty today, we are calling for a worldwide effort to abolish capital punishment! I encourage everyone who is taking a stand against this
